long.am,ar,et:
AI Assistant is an artificial intelligence assistant that can be used on any website.

AI Assistant - Sidebar with ChatGPT powerful features:
-ChatGPT is a product of OpenAI, and the AI assistant is based on ChatGPT to realize intelligent services
-Powerful sidebar with support for Customizable Prompts, ChatGPT translator, rewrite text, ChatGPT programming, grammar check, writing papers, summarizing, chatting with ChatGPT, etc.
-Optimize your writing, enhance your reading, can act as your reading and writing assistant.
-Support Customizable Prompts, you can ask any questions on any webpage
-Easy to use
-Free

Examplesï¼š
ğŸ“– Reading Assistant: Summarizes, lists key points, explains complex text, explains code, and translates various languages.
ğŸ“ Writing Assistant: Checks grammar, rewrites content, expands content, writes papers, modifies text, and more.
ğŸ’¬ Chat: Chat freely with ChatGPT.
ğŸ‘¦ Customized Question Reply: Replies to content on social media platforms such as Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, ProductHunt, etc. Also replies to chat content on WhatsApp, Slack, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger, responds to emails, selects web content to answer any questions, and more.

How to Use an AI Assistant - ChatGPT Sidebar
1. Click the "Add" button located in the upper right corner.
2. Select either the "Ask Questions" or "Chat" mode.
3. Enter the text or select content from the webpage, choose a template or customize the question, submit and generate.
4. Copy the generated results to any desired location.




















------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

long.en,en_AU,ms,no:
ChatsNow: OpenAI ChatGPT SideBar(GPT- 4o, Draw) is an artificial intelligence assistant that utilizes OpenAI's ChatGPT to provide intelligent services. It supports o1-preview, GPT-4o, GPT-4, Claude , Gemini models, helping you with writing, AI-generated drawings, enhancing Google and Newbing search engines, and providing answers to various questions.
ğŸš€ Free GPT-4 giveaway is open! ğŸš€
Install the extension now to sign up for an account and get free access to GPT-4o.

ChatsNow: AI Assistant - Sidebar with ChatGPT powerful features:
-ChatGPT is a product of OpenAI, and the AI assistant is based on ChatGPT to realize intelligent services. Support for o1-preview, GPT-4o, GPT-4, Claude3 Opus, Gemini Pro is now available.
-Integrate a powerful sidebar in the browser, supporting for Customizable Prompts, ChatGPT translator, rewrite text, ChatGPT programming, grammar check, writing papers, summarizing, chatting with ChatGPT, etc.
-Optimize your writing, enhance your reading, can act as your reading and writing assistant.
-Support Customizable Prompts, you can ask any questions on any webpage
-Enhance your search engine results by quickly obtaining higher quality answers that combine online content with powerful AI responses.
-Built-in over 100+ preset suggestion templates, can be optimized for your writing, marketing, coding, translation, and other activities. Additionally, you can add any suggestion templates you like and activate them with just one click on any webpage.
-Easy to use
-Free

Examples:
ğŸ“– Reading Assistant: Summarizes, lists key points, explains complex text, explains code, and translates various languages.
ğŸ“ Writing Assistant: Checks grammar, rewrites content, expands content, writes papers, modifies text, and more.
ğŸ’¬ Chat: Chat freely with ChatGPT.
ğŸ”Enhanced Search: One-click access to the core content of search engines. Supports all popular search engines such as Google, Baidu, Bing, and DuckDuckGo, making it convenient for users who frequently switch between different search engines.
ğŸ‘¦ Customized Question Reply: Replies to content on social media platforms. Also replies to chat content, responds to emails, selects web content to answer any questions, and more.
AI painting: It allows you to input text to generate pictures just like using Midjourney, stable diffusion, and Dall-E to draw pictures.

How to Use ChatsNow: AI Assistant - ChatGPT Sidebar
1. Click the "Add" button located in the upper right corner.
2. Select either the "Ask","Chat","Write" or "Draw" mode.
3. Enter the text or select content from the webpage, choose a template or customize the question, submit and generate.
4. Copy the generated results to any desired location.

Support GPT-3.5, GPT-4, Claude3 Opus, Gemini Pro and other models. With the ChatsNow AI Assistant extension, you can instantly write, translate, summarize, rewrite, explain, or respond to any text, including professional code and industry-specific knowledge, without needing to sign in to your ChatGPT (OpenAI) account. The running speed of the ChatsNow AI Assistant extension is just as fast as ChatGPT Plus. It also a AI Copilot powered by ChatGPT.
Like Sider and Monica, we improve work/study efficiency.

AI Assistant is an artificial intelligence assistant that can be used on any website.

-ChatGPT is a product of OpenAI, and the AI assistant is based on ChatGPT to realize intelligent services
-Powerful sidebar with support for Customizable Prompts, ChatGPT translator, rewrite text, ChatGPT programming, grammar check, writing papers, summarizing, chatting with ChatGPT, etc.

AI Assistant is an artificial intelligence assistant that can be used on any website.

AI Assistant - Sidebar with ChatGPT powerful features:
-ChatGPT is a product of OpenAI, and the AI assistant is based on ChatGPT to realize intelligent services
-Powerful sidebar with support for Customizable Prompts, ChatGPT translator, rewrite text, ChatGPT programming, grammar check, writing papers, summarizing, chatting with ChatGPT, etc.
-Optimize your writing, enhance your reading, can act as your reading and writing assistant.
-Support Customizable Prompts, you can ask any questions on any webpage
-Easy to use
-Free

ğŸ“– Reading Assistant: Summarizes, lists key points, explains complex text, explains code, and translates various languages.

1. Click the "Add" button located in the upper right corner.
2. Select either the "Ask Questions" or "Chat" mode.
3. Enter the text or select content from the webpage, choose a template or customize the question, submit and generate.
4. Copy the generated results to any desired location.

long.sl:
AI Assistant is an artificial intelligence assistant that can be used on any website.

AI Assistant - Sidebar with ChatGPT powerful features:
-ChatGPT is a product of OpenAI, and the AI assistant is based on ChatGPT to realize intelligent services
-Powerful sidebar with support for Customizable Prompts, ChatGPT translator, rewrite text, ChatGPT programming, grammar check, writing papers, summarizing, chatting with ChatGPT, etc.
-Optimize your writing, enhance your reading, can act as your reading and writing assistant.
-Support Customizable Prompts, you can ask any questions on any webpage
-Easy to use
-Free

Examplesï¼š
ğŸ“– Reading Assistant: Summarizes, lists key points, explains complex text, explains code, and translates various languages.
ğŸ“ Writing Assistant: Checks grammar, rewrites content, expands content, writes papers, modifies text, and more.
ğŸ’¬ Chat: Chat freely with ChatGPT.
ğŸ‘¦ Customized Question Reply: Replies to content on social media platforms such as Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, ProductHunt, etc. Also replies to chat content on WhatsApp, Slack, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger, responds to emails, selects web content to answer any questions, and more.

How to Use an AI Assistant - ChatGPT Sidebar
1. Click the "Add" button located in the upper right corner.
2. Select either the "Ask Questions" or "Chat" mode.
3. Enter the text or select content from the webpage, choose a template or customize the question, submit and generate.
4. Copy the generated results to any desired location.
